sentences.en: Nice location and corner lot house in Hacienda Heights.
sentences.cn: 优良的位置和角落土地房屋在哈岗。

sentences.en: She was born to an illiterate mother who ran her own hacienda.
sentences.cn: 她的母亲是文盲，有着自己的庄园。

sentences.en: When the Hacienda died, many said a piece of Manchester died.
sentences.cn: 当“庄园”夜总会倒闭时，许多人说，曼彻斯特的一部分完了。
